intent_atoms.description: Deliver end-user documentation for the ISOInspector app workflows
Document CLI usage, streaming exports, and validation flows for automation scenarios
Documentation must reference existing Kit API behavior without adding new code changes
Call sites remain unchanged; documentation-only iteration
No runtime changes; backward compatibility preserved
Documentation validated with scripts/fix_markdown.py and Markdownlint
Public Kit API must not be altered by this documentation effort
Use existing SwiftUI shell for App documentation

functional_units.name: ISOInspector App Documentation
functional_units.description: User manual for the ISOInspector app workflows, covering onboarding, search/filter controls, detail pane, and persistence behavior in SwiftUI shell.

functional_units.name: CLI Documentation
functional_units.description: Command-line interface guide detailing global options and commands: inspect, validate, export, batch, including usage guidance and streaming exports.

functional_units.name: Documentation Generation Scripts
functional_units.description: Scripts for validating and linting documentation markdown files (scripts/fix_markdown.py, markdownlint-cli2).
